price: ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߟߊߡߌ߲߬ ߠߊ߫ ߦߋ߲߬ ߞߙߏ߫ ߞߘߎ߬ߣߍ߲ ߠߎ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߏ߬ ߟߎ߬ ߘߐߞߏߟߌ߲ ߦߋ߫ ߢߊߡߊ߲ߞߎ߲ ߠߋ߬ ߘߌ߫
arabic: وَيُسۡقَوۡنَ فِيهَا كَأۡسٗا كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا زَنجَبِيلًا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wayus'qawna fīhā kasan kāna mizājuhā zanjabīlan
translations: And they will be given to drink
